summary: AN ORDINANCE relating to the Engineering Department; increasing an expenditure allowance in the 1979 Budget of the Engineering Department; making a reimbursable appropriation from the Engineering Operating Fund for increased construction costs of Phase 4 (Roosevelt Way N.E.) and Phase 7 (5th Ave. S. Bridge), being portions of the Roadway Structures Rehabilitation Project; and authorizing the hiring of consultants and the awarding of contracts therefor.
